text: Koraa, ‘tomaloke bharai coraa na'ine, allahe yadi tomalokara sraranasakti arau drstisakti harana karai laya arau tomalokara hrdayata mohara marai diye tente allahara bahirae tomalokara kona ilaha ache yiye e'ibora ubhata'i diba’? Coraa, kenekai ami ayatasamuha bisadabharae barnana karao, iyara pichato sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya
